Negative_Review: Air conditioner is dropping while it is operating We asked front desk to fix it but eventually it was all the same
Positive_Review: location modern and stylish room facility is beyong our expectation Front desk is friendly and speaks English very fluently

Negative_Review: Awful noise insulation on the walls of the room or no more noise proofing All the time the neighbors were in our room Of our request to be given a champion staff at the reception desk refused although the reception itself was an unused champion They offered to give it only if we get the wine from them Horror
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The swimming pool wasn t open first thing in the morning when I would have most likely used it There weren t enough towel rails hooks in the bathroom
Positive_Review: Hotel staff very helpful friendly and spoke excellent English Hotel very clean had all the facilities you would need easy to access centre of Barcelona The hotel is also reasonably accessible for disabled people

Negative_Review: Staff a little un friendly they need to smile more
Positive_Review: Breakfast was nice and hotel very smart as clean and the rooftop pool is lovely 3 minute walk from metro so we used that to get everywhere which was perfect

Negative_Review: Leaking shower the only bad thing Constantly wet floor in the hallway is a bit disappointing
Positive_Review: Location is perfect subway train station is nearby a lot of good places are within walking distance room is clean and comfortable perfect breakfast

Negative_Review: I thought it was a bit too expensive The walls were too thin so I could hear what was going on in the rooms next to mine and in the hallway The shower doors don t close properly and so all the water flooded the bathroom
Positive_Review: Super friendly staff they were always nice and helpful Good location Very clean Very good breakfast

Negative_Review: Car parking is quite pricey but is probably comparable with other hotels in the city
Positive_Review: Friendly helpful staff clean rooms Handy location for attractions and underground Reasonable price for location

Negative_Review: I didn t like the mattress which was a bit uncomfortable and our crazy loud neighbours
Positive_Review: The rooftop pool is really awesome You can find a lot of nice bars in the neighbourhood that are not as crowded with tourists as in the city centre

Negative_Review: The AC wasn t working in my room Even after I had informed the staff and was told it was working it wasn t This made sleeping uncomfortable
Positive_Review: Nice room excellent and helpful staff Neighbourhood was perfect Lots of great restaurants and tapas bars easy to walk around the city from here

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Good hotel reasonable extra cost for breakfast 9 euros plenty of places to get meals in the vicinity hotels was very comfortable high standard of rooms

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Plan was to reach the Hotel by taxi from the Airport but they were striking I contacted the hotel to ask how to reach them A front desk employee Marina did the perfect job to help me with the metro she wrote an email with every single indications needed not only the metro stations but also how to orient myself inside the station etc When I arrived in the hotel she was helping other people on another topic Big thanks to Marina who saved me a lot of time with a smile on top of that

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This is an excellent location if you want to be away from the touristy areas but within walking distance It is a perfectly reasonable small clean modern hotel at a very good price on days we stayed it was half the cost of one of the hostels

Negative_Review: Please ser above
Positive_Review: No hot water f rst morning 1 lamp on bathroom toilet without light claimed to reception first morning without Any effect bed very noisy tables not cleaned at breakfast cheese and eggs emptied without refilling

Negative_Review: Everything about this hotel was just perfect for us
Positive_Review: At this hotel I received the BEST customer service I have ever had or could ever imagine There were two Alejandros at the front desk evening Alejandro made me laugh and smile every time I saw him He helped me with a technological glitch that I encountered when trying to book a tour He would not let me leave the hotel without a map and clear directions On the one rainy day he would not let me leave without an umbrella Morning Alejandro took pity on me when our airport shuttle did not show up I was panicking about missing our flight and he kept me calm and helped me to hail a cab We made it with three minutes to spare I could go on and on about how they made me feel special and cared for in every way

Negative_Review: The room was very small the water was coming out from the shower to the washroom and to the room There was some weird smell in the room Price money ratio is really poor
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Too small rooms critical audibility unpleasant smell in corrodor and room suffocated
Positive_Review: Good location very nice personal highly helpful good breakfast good bed

Negative_Review: It was not comfortable to sleep there The bed was quite small but the most uncomfortable thing is the length of the bed It was short I m 174 cm heigh and if you use pillow your legs will be not on the bed I didn t sleep also because of our neighbors We have stayed in the room 103 The other room has a bed with a head to the same wall Our neighbors had sex all night long and the wall moved some times and their bed squeaked very annoying Last time I woke up at 5 00 am It was not nice Carton walls The other thing was water from shower it was leaking to the corridor in our room The Hooks for towels were installed just right above the toilet Of course towels can fall sometimes guess where We had view from the window to some dirty wall
Positive_Review: Very nice staff good location you can park your car on the street without any charges on Sunday nice breakfast for only 9 90 EUR

Negative_Review: On our last night we choose to have dinner at the hotel and it was not good at all Our waiter was also the chef and his english was not good Not to mention it took an hour to bring us our food and it was not what we ordered This was a bit disappointing
Positive_Review: Breakfast was very good A lot to choose from and the coffee was the best

Negative_Review: Breakfast was not good bad was not comfortable and bathtub not easy to use The price was way too much high for they offer
Positive_Review: Position of the hotel very central and easy to walk around or catch public transportation Lots of nice restaurant bars and activities shops and touristic attractions nearby Staff very helpful and friendly but the room was not done properly

Negative_Review: The service could have been better it felt personal was rather annoyed than welcoming almost all the time no extra coffee in room after asking for it mattress was very soft and uncomfortable the treadmill in the gym was not working anyways gym offered only 3 devices overall not worth the quite expensive price
Positive_Review: Location was top

Negative_Review: The first night I checked in I asked for a dental kit and the receptionist told me that the housekeeper is gone and he doesn t know where is the dental kit The second morning I asked again and the other person just took it out from the reception desk The staff is not well trained And I do understand they don t have enough people but every time I ask for something I need to go down and get it by my self That is a little bit annoying
Positive_Review: Good location

Negative_Review: gym closed noise from other rooms was bit much the bed was noisy more comfortable mattress is much needed
Positive_Review: Location bathroom facilities and hotel room layout

Negative_Review: poor sound proof My room was on the second floor and I heard people talking and laughing on streets Moreover you can hear your neighbor enjoying themselves clearly awkward sounds First day there was an opened sugar bag on cafe table and there was no coffee Second day there was also no coffee supplies
Positive_Review: Good location super kind and helpful frontdesk staff

Negative_Review: No desk in the room double bed consisting of two coasting beds No mount for towels in bath room noisy environment
Positive_Review: large room and bathroom helpful staff

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were lovely room was very modern and the hotel was in a perfect location 2 metro lines either sides of the roads And also very close to all the attractions by taxi or train

Negative_Review: Shower in room 306 leaks water into the whole room Repeated efforts to get it fixed were not answered Beds are very short Feet will hang out of the bed
Positive_Review: Good location

Negative_Review: The doors let through a lot of noise from the elevator No balcony Swimming pool was cold But all in all very good
Positive_Review: Rooms were great Big and modern Staff were helpfull

Negative_Review: Our bed made noise everytime when moving but it seems to be bad luck because others in our group didn t have that
Positive_Review: Everything was clean and well organized

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staffs at reception are very very friendly and happy to help They lent me a wall converter and helped to hail a taxi at the time we left One day we decided to have diner at the hotel s restaurant and we were the only persons there but the waiter was still very professional Room is super spacious modern and comfortable There is even a music tower I didn t find there is any problem with sound proof but I don t know whether the next room is empty or not Location is good short walking distance to subway and casa mila Overall great value

Negative_Review: Much noisy Much water came out of the bath room to the room
Positive_Review: So much noisy and personal couldnt help After making video so they can hear them self was to late

Negative_Review: The walls were really thin so we ended up waking many times during night due to noise in the hall or in the other rooms Bed was also very noisy
Positive_Review: Location is excellent Close to may restaurants and transportation

Negative_Review: The restaurant wasn t very welcoming it was never obvious when it was open Plenty of places to eat nearby though
Positive_Review: Great location and comfortable room

Negative_Review: Paid for a sound proof room turns out that means it has double glazed windows The walls are thin and offer no sound proofing good to hear our neighbours enjoying themselves Had to put a magazine under one of the bed legs the stable the bed Toiletries were no existent management wouldn t front to address our concerns and just hid behind the front desk staff who were lovely Whilst there are signs it has recently been refurbished it s a pig in lipstick It appears only cosmetic issues were addressed It s a budget three star hotel
Positive_Review: The front desk staff were fantastic

Negative_Review: It s more like a high end 3 stars hotel And to be fair 3 5 stars would be the right ranking Menu is weak Pillows could be better Room is kind of crammed No free water Closet doesn t have a door
Positive_Review: Location is in a nice upscale and central area Lots of good restaurants around the area Staff were helpful and attentive Shower was excellent Metro line is 100 m away

Negative_Review: More choice needed at breakfast as it was very limited I feel the room was great but the mattress was not comfy at all felt as if it was covered in plastic
Positive_Review: I liked the style of the hotel the new rooms and bathroom Loved the fact we had a speaker in the room Good location as still easy access to all the main sites

Negative_Review: Nice hotel however our door to our room did not lock so was left open all the time I asked the gentleman at the desk to fix the issue however later in evening when we came back the door was still not fixed We had to Use the unit to cover the door during the night and in the day we had to put other belongings on the safe Not good enough when I asked them to fix it and they didn t
Positive_Review: Beds comfy and clean

Negative_Review: Rooms not very well designed no towel racks to hang up used towels The stand meant to hold the suitcase was too small for a normal sized suitcase
Positive_Review: Rooms were spacious and clean Close to sightseeing bus stop We could walk to many places Staff were extremely friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: I guess I asked for a double bed but got twin It was still ok I guess my request for a higher floor got prioritised
Positive_Review: Very modern hotel designed with travellers with gadgets in mind It had everything we needed the added bonus of Bluetooth sound system

Negative_Review: Very poor soundproofing I could hear everything the guests were doing in the next room and the lift sounded like if it was in the room itself
Positive_Review: Amazing friendliness of all the staff whereas reception or cleaning ladies

Negative_Review: The walls is extremely thin you can even hear people talking snoring or having sex It was only problem but very disappoint
Positive_Review: Location Staff are helpful Good interiors Clean

Negative_Review: Sound proofing was poor so I could hear the street outside and people next door if they walk talk or even open the curtain
Positive_Review: Location is excellent room is clean and comfortable staff is very helpful and cheerful size of the room and bathroom are great and wifi was very good

Negative_Review: Bed covers and sheets felt like they were plactic
Positive_Review: There was plenty to choose from at breakfast big Bluetooth speaker in your room when you finish your stay but you still have a lot of time left there is an option to leave the bags in the hotel and come back for them later

Negative_Review: Paper thin walls heard snoring all night from one room and taking and sex on the other until 3am And I wear earplugs Doors slamming at 8am and even the cleaners slamming doors Air conditioned didn t seem to do anything either
Positive_Review: Clean

Negative_Review: There was no downside at all really
Positive_Review: Loved the location of the hotel and the fact that the staff were super friendly and helpful Also one of the very few Spanish hotels to provide coffee and tea making facilities in the room Huge well done for that one

Negative_Review: that for the upgrade to suite the bathroom did not have a door and the balcony could not just be compared
Positive_Review: staff and generally the amenities of the Hotel are good

Negative_Review: Sorry I don t usually do this but I wouldn t want anyone looking as forward to this place as much as me get disappointed it says Room Soundproof but it is NOT This was the most annoying thing If you are there to relax as a couple most of the time forget about it both rooms we stayed in 4 nights were poorly isolated You can hear people s conversation from the other room walking in heels at 2am as if they were in yours EARING them SNORING at night earring them going to the bathroom flushing their toilets listening to music watching TV absolutely EVERYTHING All four nights Which means they can also hear us and I imagine it s annoying if you hope to sleep in later than 9 930ish in the morning FORGET ABOUT IT TOO The ladies are doing the housekeeping which is normal BUT as the walls are so thin you will hear them and it will wake you up The noise goes from 9ish to 10 30ish approximately sometimes later than that depending on the rooms to do on the floor You can hear them very loudly moving furniture or plugging the vacuum in the wall and your wall vibrates yes And if they put music to enjoy their day which I salute unfortunately if you had planned on sleeping in then no forget about it you will hear their phones or their little speakers Again I m not saying it s bad to listen to music I completely understand them however I just wish the walls weren t so thin that we wouldn t have to listen if we want to sleep I ve stayed inside big cities before this hotel can really do better regarding the noise the beds slip there s nothing you can do about it They re extremely light and slip very easily The mattresses weren t so comfortable either Maybe it s that I expected more and I m sorry for that but no we didn t find them very comfortable the shower jets didn t work You get 3 options to get the water under your shower
Positive_Review: The staff was nice and when I went to tell them I had ordered a room with a double bed and not two twins they switched our room very easily Lots of efforts from the staff to make the stay nice and the designs of the hotel can be cool But read the cons please

Negative_Review: The gym is a tiny room with only three machines in it
Positive_Review: Very helpful and friendly staff room was bigger than I ve expected great breakfast buffet

Negative_Review: Bed was making squeaky noises way too much and we had to ask them to change and they sent next day a maintenance guy who told us later that it was fixed even it wasn t fixed Later however they gave us a room with nice bed
Positive_Review: Location is quite amazing

Negative_Review: Expected more of this 4 star hotel the bathroom was clean but there was low pressure in the shower The bed sheets are changed after 2 days
Positive_Review: Good cleanliness overall and good facilities

Negative_Review: bed is smaller than it looks in photos Among all the great restaurant in town the receptionist recommended us to one of the worst and most tourist restaurant of them all
Positive_Review: nice location friendly staff nice room with a reasonable price

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: It is a very beautiful and clean hotel Bluetooth speaker in the room and very beautiful bathroom Different pillows to choose from directly on the bed in the room for better comfort

Negative_Review: Walls between rooms thin I could hear the man in the next room snoring and their alarm go off in the morning and the words of the conversation of people in another room
Positive_Review: Great location Convenient Great staff

Negative_Review: Parking complications outrageous prices
Positive_Review: Enjoyable stay with no negative observations other than the parking Welcoming staff with eagerness to help

Negative_Review: The double bed was a bit small
Positive_Review: I was really happy with our hotel It was so cozy and spacious Also super clean with super friendly staff very happy we stayed there

Negative_Review: Location is not very good Just near Casa Mila and Casa Batllo 10 minutes is needed for walking to the railway station
Positive_Review: Room is relatively spacious quiet

Negative_Review: Bed is not confortable toweld are terrible and the cleaning staff makes so much noise that it was impossible to sleep when they came to cleam neighbors rooms
Positive_Review: Location and smell

Negative_Review: Pillows were a bit hard and room a little small Overall it was a fantastic experience
Positive_Review: The location was great Hotel chic and great ambience Staff went above and beyond So helpful

Negative_Review: Lighting Bathroom is walled in opaque glass so if one person wakes up earlier lighting in bathroom essentially lights up room Buffet breakfast should offer not only scrambled eggs but either poached or at least hard boiled or best on request fried eggs This was my 4th buffet breakfast in Spain the only one that did not offer one of the above
Positive_Review: Loved the location although not in a center of attractions it was close enough offered a neighborhood feeling GREAT restaurant cafes Staff was welcoming helpful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location is perfect room and hotel very clean and super friendly staff The bed very comfortable and the air conditioning from the room was like paradise in those hot days We would definitely go back

Negative_Review: We could have chosen our weekend better Bargelona had a public holiday on Saturday and many places were shut for the weekend Not the hotel s fault though
Positive_Review: Very convenient for all tourist attractions within walking distance of the Sagradia Familia and two excellent restaurants just round the corner Hotel breakfasts good too

Negative_Review: Nothing It was great
Positive_Review: We stayed for 3 nights in the room 303 It was a quiet clean room in modern style The service of this hotel is amazing We needed more tissues we got it we needed more boils we got it we take the electrical bikes the hole day we got it 2 e bikes 20 in total a day we want a cafe con leche m we got it on the roof top 1 40 for a great coffee The area of the hotel is great You will reached really nice and cheap restaurants quiet near with tapas paella and other goods outside on the terrace The metro is such near and you will never wait for a train longer than 2 minutes The breakfast is large You should book it for 9 99 per person It is really delicious

Negative_Review: I didn t like the fact that the silicone in bathroom shower had mold growing over it in some areas as shown in the pics I posted The silicon should be either cleaned or reapplied
Positive_Review: The room was clean and the bed was comfortable The bathroom has a modern design and the pictures of the room and bathroom match those shown on booking

Negative_Review: The room is not really soundproof Luckily our neighbors weren t very noisy The closet wardrobe was too small Not enough space to organize everything if you are staying for a longer period of time The bathroom although was quite modern the door left a gap between the door and the glass wall not much privacy
Positive_Review: The location is walking distance to great restaurants shops some touristic locations The staff was great friendly and helpful The room is a good size modern and nicely decorated The cleaning service was very good Comfortable bed and the docking station was a nice touch

Negative_Review: Rooms view was average Gym very small Shower tended to flood No coffee in room just tea Only one working power socket for charging phones cameras etc
Positive_Review: Big bathroom In nice area

Negative_Review: One very minor thing the bathroom did not have a door so not ideal for privacy
Positive_Review: Everything was perfect lovely minimalistic decor super friendly staff stylish rooms comfortable bed huge bathroom with all sorts of free toiletries and a decent swimming pool on the rooftop The location was ideal just a 3 minute walk from Provenca station and a short walk from Passeig de Gracia Will definitely come back

Negative_Review: It is quiet expensive for 4 star hotel
Positive_Review: The hotel near to metro station and in a nice neibourhood the room was nice especially after getting free upgrade to a suite

Negative_Review: Nothing in particular
Positive_Review: First of all the staff all the guys that we met at the reception were absolutely kind and available to help us in any need and at any time Great location quiet but with lots of facilities shops restaurants very well connected by transports Clean room well equipped tidied up and having towels changed every day

Negative_Review: unfortunatelly no towel rack in the bathroom despite the signs saying that only towels left on the floor would be changed all the towels were systematically replaced every day
Positive_Review: Great location for visiting nightbuses bring you back juste 2 blocks away Modern roooms nice staff

Negative_Review: The rooftop pool like almost all rooftop pools in Barcelona is too small to really swim in But this isn t really much of an issue because Barcelona has so much to do and see that most people don t need to spend a lot of time at the pool
Positive_Review: Our stay at the hotel was great We landed at 8am and they let us check in immediately upon arrival Every time we walked by the desk the staff greeted us by name and tehy often asked us whether there was anything they could do for us The room was very comfortable and quiet and the location is amazing

Negative_Review: Watch the steps ladder into the pool The power sockets to the kettle meant you had to make a cup of tea on the floor The shower flooded the bathroom in 10 minutes so the enviro towel policy was useless
Positive_Review: The pool terrace super friendly helpful staff and a great breakfast

Negative_Review: The very small gym had just 3 cardio machines no space to do push ups and no weights
Positive_Review: Friendly staffs clean good breakfast Nice pool on the roof top Good location walking distance to everything

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The location is amazing Enriqo Granados is one of my fav streets in Barecelona and quiet yet at the heart of the city and you could walk anywhere The economy room had an ample space for a solo traveller and bed very comfortable I personally didn t have issues with the sound proofing of Room 502 Wifi is great and strong bathroom super clean and big

Negative_Review: Some distance from the Barri Gothic Good if you have been to the city before and want to explore a new area Especially the eixample and Garcia areas
Positive_Review: Good hard beds Air con Clean

Negative_Review: We could hear people in the other rooms talking even when they were not talking loud The beds were on wheels not stable moving when the occupant is moving Not comfortable
Positive_Review: Good location Staff

Negative_Review: Well it was not the hotel My room was in between two families and their childrents were playing and slamming the doors Crazy family
Positive_Review: Very good location and a very clean hotel

Negative_Review: The bed was not comfortable and too noisy and the walls were thin as paper I couldn t sleep one single total night You can ear people talking clearly I have stayed for 5 nights and they gave me the worst room they have with view to some house s terrace with trousers hanged Unfortunately the best price on booking corresponds always to a room like this it s the same like sleeping in the underground The breakfast was really poor No healthy food The reception workers were just not nice or helpful I always need a taxi and I have only asked for help on the first day He have asked me for a taxi and told me 5 min it took 25 minutes for a taxi to arrive and he gave it to another clients in the hotel I have arrived late to work it s just not acceptable I really can manage myself and ask for my own taxi and that was what I have done for that day and all the others Not a good experience
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Shower leaks out into main area fresh hotel towels had old hair on them cleaning staff were very rude to us after we complained they didn t make our room by 4pm
Positive_Review: Beds were comfortable room looked modern

Negative_Review: Rooms not cleaned until late each afternoon Might have been better if those on the top floors could have their rooms cleaned early on a few occasions during the week Breakfast were just OK
Positive_Review: The hotel was in a quiet area though a distance from the centre There was good access to transport and metro

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Beds very comfortable air conditioning was welcome on hot nights and the staff could not be faulted excellent service with happy smiling faces daily

Negative_Review: Required double bed but got 2 single beds that was uncomfortable because the bed was keeping move away and many times I nearly felt down at the middle Thin wall between rooms you can hear next door activities Expensive mini bar
Positive_Review: close to provenca and dianogal stations just 3 10 mins walk Close to some restaurants cafes and supermakets Easy to walk to everywhere Friendly receptions and staff the room was clean and spacious wifi works well

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The best location 2 min from underground station Close to the best spots such as good quality restaurants cafes bars The room was with big terrassa with magnifique view The best way to start a day breakfast at the room in terrassa and then just go the 9th floor for enjoying the roof top view in the swimming pool

Negative_Review: I did inform them weeks in advance that we would be arriving early due to our early flight It would ve been nice if we didn t have to wait till 2pm to check in
Positive_Review: Comfy beds very clean rooms and great location

Negative_Review: Shower was not good designed and a lot of water was around it after you used it
Positive_Review: Staff was very helpful hotel was nice and has very good location Breakfast was good too Room was with street view but very quiet and clean

Negative_Review: Soundproofing not great
Positive_Review: Great location short walking distance to Diagonal metro 5min or even to Placa de Catalunya 20min Clean and modern room nice shower Rituals bodylotion Reception staff was lovely

Negative_Review: Bed was rather short but confortable There were only 3 sun beds on the roof terrace
Positive_Review: Room design was new modern clean Breakfast was ok The location was good The stuff was very helpful

Negative_Review: Unfortunattly the rooms have no soundproof That is a really bad thing
Positive_Review: The hotel is nice Clean room modern decorated rooms The location is also good near to Passeig de Gracia which is a important shopping street It also has a metro station near to the hotel a supermarket and nice little places to eat or drink something

Negative_Review: We took double bed but it was very small and unconfortable Every morning I woke up tired There was nothing healthy to eat for breakfast They should not list the gym as a service Treadmil and elipse only is not the gym The gym room is like 6 square metres No weigths Room walls very thin We coul hear other guest chating and having fun The room was so small tha only bed could fit in it
Positive_Review: No complaints about wifi and staff

Negative_Review: Gym not a gym only 3 Cardio machines The buffet breakfast is good value for money but there could have been a wider range of food Mixed feelings on the la cartel menu had two nice freshly made pizzas however didn t have a good steak nor pasta bolannaise
Positive_Review: Staff friendly polite and helpful Bluetooth enabled speaker in the room made getting ready to go out more enjoyable rooms were sound proof Our room was always cleaned to a very high standard The twin room was a good size good value for money Good location Overall really enjoyed my stay at BCN

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Hotel location is incredibly excellent specially for who is in weight loss program i used to walk from the hotel to Marina return back which was great chance to lose 5 kg 11lb in just 7 days

Negative_Review: Rooms a bit small but I guess good for the price
Positive_Review: Nice hotel with clean rooms with easy access to metro If one doesn t mind walking a good location to explore Barcelona Helpful and friendly staff

Negative_Review: Reservation made for double bed turned out to be twin beds at check in Breakfast is dull poor quality Lift noises are a nuisance because of stupid messages of their PA system when opening closing doors
Positive_Review: Large room and bathroom

Negative_Review: Wish they had some English tv channels Toiletries were not replaced Bins were not emptied
Positive_Review: Very friendly helpful staff Good breakfast Air conditioning worked well

Negative_Review: Is very low soundproof all the noises from the other rooms can be heard like closing the entrace door to hearing all the speaking We had the room on the back yard of the hotel so the exterior sound was ok This is the only thing we didn t liked
Positive_Review: Great location great room very clean

Negative_Review: The rooms were not that good sound proofed
Positive_Review: The location is great and everything is within walking distance 20 min to Sagrada La Bocqueria Stations for public transportation are nearby The staff was really friendly and supportive Thank you very much for a lovely stay

Negative_Review: Breakfast is very average same assortment but not smartly put together You have champaigne but no boiled eggs or good coffee If you pay extra not worth it although i had asked for additional shampoo they didnt renew it for 2 days We basically gave it up
Positive_Review: Location very convenient overall stay was with no problems

Negative_Review: Breakfast very moderate
Positive_Review: Comfort rooms clean and modern room Nice bathroom Nice view over street Perfect and calm location in Barcelona not being too central The sushi bar across street is one of the best ever I ve tried Minibar in room

Negative_Review: As others have mentioned the walls were thin some facilities felt like they could be updated and for me the breakfast wasn t great
Positive_Review: Room was clean comfortable and spacious

Negative_Review: Only 2 English tv channels but that was ok because I wanted to try learning a some Spanish
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely helpful in giving directions and generally smiling and happy to help with any questions When I checked in I was offered a complementary beverage I chose a glass of wine Everyone spoke English Breakfast was excellent with lots of choices and good coffee

Negative_Review: Pool misrepresented and tiny area around it Shower leaked into entrance Smoke detector covers with plastic bag Illegal
Positive_Review: Modern hotel Good staff Good location

Negative_Review: They gave us to separate beds joint together and in description it was it is a double The walls were a bit tin
Positive_Review: The location is great basically you can walk to the center a lot of shops and restaurants The room was very clean and modern

Negative_Review: the bedroom had a very bad smell like urine When I told the concierge about this she started to laugh don t understand how can this be funny that a 4 star hotel smells like urine and then staff starts laughing on it and not taking guest serious
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Rooms a lil bit too small but very modern and clean Watch out for shower coz it was leaking into hall badly design basin but thats about it
Positive_Review: The hotel staff was extremely nice Gave us all the information we needed to make the most of our stay in Barcelona Easy access to Metro wich takes you anywhere you want

Negative_Review: One has to be an engineer to find out all the functions from the shower which was anyway a goog shower
Positive_Review: All persons working in the hotell were friendly and helpfull The room was modern with good beds quiet and clean very good value for money WIFI was OK all the time

Negative_Review: Only 1 lift was working which was a slight inconvenience and maintenance was being done on the other lift which was a bit noisy
Positive_Review: Good location which is close to the Metro and lots of restaurants which was lively at night

Negative_Review: Cleanliness level is very poor and need improvement to keep the hotel as good as it should be
Positive_Review: The location is great and centrally located in the city centre Metro access is easy Alijandro in the reception and the other employees was really supportive

Negative_Review: The room was a little bit hot even with the air conditioning We booked a room with a double bed but got two single beds The bathroom was 95 cleaned The cleaning staff got a little bit lazy and missed out on a few spots
Positive_Review: The reception is open 24 hours The staff was friendly and help us arrange a taxi early in the morning to the airport The room is modern and contemporary

Negative_Review: the bed was uncomfortable and the housekeeping staff always forget to put bathroom amenities in the bath and i must always remind them several times for this and beside a lift in the hotel was out of use and after 5 days it was still closed Although they told us that it will be repaired soon
Positive_Review: only the location

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Super clean Quiet 3 min walk to Diagonal metro station Its great if you want to be able to get in the midst of everything Still be able to escape the crowds when you want too

Negative_Review: What we found really dissapointing was the fact that towels were not changed for 3 consecutive days And more intolerable was that cleaning ladies folded the towels every morning and put them as they were new ones It seems too strange when you pay 90 per night and face such kind of issues Hope to be solved
Positive_Review: Such great very helpful and friendly staff Just after our arrival the recepsion guy Alejandro together with his colleague helped us for everything we asked The location was perfect You can reach by walking Sagrada La Rambla Placa Catalunya etc Also the area around had some great bars and restaurants The room was really good Breakfast was delicious and had everything needed but it could be better

Negative_Review: Double bed was actually two single beds pushed together Any sudden movements on the bed would move the beds around or separate them
Positive_Review: Location is great neighborhood is filled with restaurants shops and coffee places easy access to metro Rooms are pretty big good bathroom facilities and pretty quiet we had room with view in the backyard The bluetooth speaker was a nice touch allowing us to listen to music from our phones while in the room

Negative_Review: Only had one dinner at the hotel Valerio provided excellent service but the food was disappointing given the standards elsewhere in the hotel A minor point if you like a bath in your bathroom these were only available in twin rooms however beds will push together
Positive_Review: Good location near enough to areas of interest but away from the crowds Friendly staff who speak excellent English and provide good customer service not the bored indifference sometimes found in city hotels Clean modern hotel Large room with superb bathroom Minimalist but comfy decor Good temperature control Our room at the rear of the hotel was very quiet Did not explore the gym or pool and had breakfast elsewhere on the go so cannot comment on these

Negative_Review: The walls are so thin that from a very early morning hour you can hear the pipes when ever some flushes the toilet or has a shower which was a bit of a pain Also trying to be modern does not always work The lack of a longer glass wall or door to the shower created a puddle when ever we showered which was a bit inconvenient
Positive_Review: Location is perfect close to everywhere Metro is a 5 minute walk same goes for Psg DeGracia and the Rambla Great restaurants around The rooms are modernly designed Breakfast was good

Negative_Review: Beds are too small and not comfortable Also hotel has really thin walls if you know what I mean limited privacy
Positive_Review: Good location very helpful staff lots of good restaurants and cafes around

Negative_Review: Room was tiny and double bed was merely two small single beds pushed together Bathroom looked like a fishbowl glass walls which gave little to no privacy The gym consisted of three machines in an over sized closet
Positive_Review: Staff were pleasant and very accommodating Breakfast was your typical continental style They offered a complimentary brunch which was nice

Negative_Review: I have nothing to complain
Positive_Review: Very good quality services audio system inside the room clean room and bath with all needed accessories in the bath Free lunch Very pleasant friendly and smiling staff

Negative_Review: If you have a car the central location could be a headache Car parks around are 30 Euros The hotel offered a nearby car park for 25 Euros
Positive_Review: For the price we paid room was decent Location of the hotel is very central Many places are within walking distance There are a lot of alternatives for eating around

Negative_Review: Shower was flooding the all room
Positive_Review: Location is good even if the road is busy the room are quiet Room is nice and design bed comfy nice staff Big and nice bathroom

Negative_Review: Walls are thin can hear people watching tv chatting through the walls Breakfast seems expensive when booking so didn t purchase it
Positive_Review: Very modern clean hotel room with excellent facilities Short walk from metro stop conveniently located

Negative_Review: Quality price excellent nothing to complain about
Positive_Review: Great Location Good size of the room nicely equipped nice modern design Great people at the reception very helpful with information

Negative_Review: The housekeepers are doing a bad job They foreget to resupply the room with amenities Daily you should ask for either shower gel coffee tea even we asked for towels and glasses that we weren t provided one day Bad door isolation you hear everything that is happening outside the door and most disturbing door slams Also the ventilation or conditioning system was making an annoying sound that was seldom heared even in night time That s not what a 4 star hotel should provide
Positive_Review: Newly rebuild hotel so everything is new Friendly reception staff Good location not too close to the crowded places but close to the most important places to be visited in Barcelona Metro station about 5 7 min from the hotel what is very convenient

Negative_Review: But thin plaster walls between hotel rooms were really awful My husband and I heard every toilet sink and opening the bathroom door neighbors room What is worse your and your neghbours beds leaned against over wall and first night I was listening Putin s speech next one other neighbours were making love in my bed it shaked so much that I was afraid they pierce the septum and appear in my be I did not pay for this extra service In total I did not sleep in the beautiful centre of Barcelona for three nights
Positive_Review: Location is great and the hotel is modern Breakfast buffet was good Thre room was clean TV was not extra but this could not spoil our rest But thin plaster walls between hotel rooms were really awful

Negative_Review: Second time in the hotel booking a double bed but given twin beds had to ask again to get the bed I wanted I hope the next time I get the bed I request
Positive_Review: Very helpful staff perfect location

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: excellent choice great value for money clean great location next to a number of bars restaurants staff extremely nice and helpful coming back for sure next time in Barcelona

Negative_Review: The walls have no sound insulation You can hear everything from next door and you have no privacy This led to problems with next door guests
Positive_Review: Excellent helpful and friendly staff

Negative_Review: It is difficult to recommend something when everything has been perfect
Positive_Review: We literally liked everything from the warm welcome upon arrival through the clean comfortable and spacious room to the efficient check out The location is great for exploring the sites of Barcelona as well as for shopping or exploring the culinary challenges around We definitely will come again if there is a reasonable offer

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location 2 mins walk to Provensa metro station and 10 mins walk to Diagonal metro station Clean rooms friendly staff great breakfast selection A no brainer if you want comfortable stay in Barcelona

Negative_Review: Bed rather small and thin walls between the rooms
Positive_Review: Modern and clean hotel in the l Eixample neighborhood Nice bathroom with rain shower Metro shops and restaurants close by Price quality good hotel

Negative_Review: They have placed bass whoffers in the room which is great but some people abuse this feature by playing it very loud at all times of the day or night but I complained and they moved the guests to another room in the hotel so that scores 10 itself
Positive_Review: The room was very clean and spacious the staff were very helpful and very accommodating Great location not exactly in the thick of everything but a 10 minute brisk walk and you are there

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Really nice location 5 min away from the Diagonal subway station The staff very nice and helpful The breakfast was ok The room was big and comfortable A very nice choice I would definitely suggest it

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent value for price Great location in Eixample near metro stops The room was modern and well designed Terrace on the top floor had wonderful views of Barcelona Staff in reception are very friendly and polite Super fast wifi available through out

Negative_Review: Never put a subwoofer in any room if the walls then are paper thin The room are not soundproof and that cause you to hear many noises from the hallway and of course from the other rooms even private times
Positive_Review: Wonderful hotel Very Clean and very close to the center The staff was also very happy to help

Negative_Review: A fair amount of traffic noise but that is normal in a city and building works next door while we were there
Positive_Review: Modern clean and very spacious room Staff very friendly and helpful Well located

Negative_Review: Rooftop pool could be better sign posted
Positive_Review: Staff went above and beyond for the comfort and satisfaction of their guests Hotel was excellent clean and well situated

Negative_Review: Why do you have speakers in your rooms As soon as a guest turns them on the bass is just going to annoy anyone in a room near them
Positive_Review: Everything Amazing wifi friendly staff great location

Negative_Review: The walls were very thin and you can even hear next doors television bed could have been comfier too
Positive_Review: Lovely boutique hotel and pleasant staff very willing to help lovely welcome on arrival too

Negative_Review: our double room had 2 single beds together and they moved extremely easy so my fianc and I had to sleep in separate beds or risking falling between beds
Positive_Review: Location the staff was so helpful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent new hotel Perfect location easy access to main attractions walking distance to Las Ramblas Sympathetic and very helpful agent Jordi prompt in replying to all enquiries

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Large with a living room a very spacious bathroom and a balcony Very comfortable and convenient and in the city center Most satisfactory hotel choice in the entire trip

Negative_Review: I paid more for bigger size room during booking but the room that was given to me so small When I requested bigger room they answered no available room with double bed
Positive_Review: everything was OK except room size

Negative_Review: Breakfast was only ok because we went close to the end and there was not a lot left
Positive_Review: Location is excellent David at the reception desk was very efficient and accommodative

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Its not very far from Rambla So you can visit many places by foot If you want to use the tourist bus its only four blocks away A metro station is near Provenca line L6 and L7 or walk a little bit for Diagonal L3 and L5

Negative_Review: Small details in the bathroom can be improved a curtain in the shower and holders for handtowels
Positive_Review: Very helpful and friendly staff Very clean hotel brand new facilities Location close to center and metro

Negative_Review: Mattress Design of shower not powerful and leaked No coffee sachets in the room initially overcharged on set lunch and had to query it
Positive_Review: Room Location Restaurant

Negative_Review: Problem with parking We had to ask several times for milk and tea and they give one or two You have to call them up again and again to get something
Positive_Review: Great location Easy travel to famous locations across Barcelona

Negative_Review: two single beds instead of double bed They were constantly dividing no remote controller in the room which made impossible to switch on the TV noise from street durinhg all night long no bathrobe and slippers
Positive_Review: modern and very clean rooms good wi fi friendly and helpful staff

Negative_Review: some details are not ok impossible tu have the right temperature in the shower difficult to plug in the kettle doors are not soundproofed I hope they take in more consideration these details they are easy to fix and can change the confort in the room
Positive_Review: Staff is ok Rooms are new and have a very beautiful style

Negative_Review: The only problem I had was with the shower The shower head actually the control handle to adjust for temperature did not work and it was not very comfortable using the other one below I was told that a solution would be found but then did not hear back They did take a look at it and see that it was not working But then I did not hear back about it
Positive_Review: Location people at the reception being quite nice and helpful the hotel being new and clean Overall it was pretty good

Negative_Review: The shower cabin does not have a door to prevent water from running all over the bathroom while taking a shower
Positive_Review: Good value for price modern design big space in the room well equipped excellent location friendly staff

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The rooftop beanbags and swimming pool The modern room that was fantastic The Bluetooth sound bar in the room was awesome All in all incredible hotel I am definitely going back there on my next visit

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Amazing helpful staff especially front desk Couldn t be any more helpful recommended local restaurants and offered to call to book Very clean and comfy highly recommend

Negative_Review: The bed is too short only 190 cm
Positive_Review: Very nice hotel close to the city center It is 400 meters from Diagonal metro station The staff was very helpfull and smile There are very good rooftop terasse with nice view The bathroom is good size

Negative_Review: No chair to sit on in the room but the bed was great so we sat on that
Positive_Review: Clean rooms nice street view great breakfast a really good choice of foods to suit all cultures

Negative_Review: The bathroom door is transparent and do not really close User shares its noise and nasty smell with the rest of the room Also there is no dim light for quite night use
Positive_Review: Perfect location in an area with many decent restaurant 100m from a metro station and walking distance of many interesting monuments The staff was extremely friendly providing advice and service with smile and enthusiasm

Negative_Review: The ONLY drawback is that the room wall insulation is poor and an indiscreet next door guest could easily spoil the peace and good experience
Positive_Review: A modern hotel in a very central location with wonderful stuff

Negative_Review: The couchins were a bit uncomfortable as we woke up the day after with a little neckpain
Positive_Review: Great staff service and location The room was spacious fresh and clean Ordered room service and the food was delicious

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: It was my second time in Barcelona so my opinion is based by compering to my previous experiance in different hotel the same standard Quiet hotel good location 10 min from Metro station Diagonal however in 20 min walk you can get to Sagrada Familia good breakfast and staff was very friendly In the neibrhood you can find restaurants with very good local food We had great time I recommend it

Negative_Review: They could have better shared facilities although I didn t use the pool I think it s small and could have been used as a great summer point at the hotel The gym is only OK
Positive_Review: The hotel is very new got a nice staff they re all very helpful and friendly The location is great nearby to a major metro station many international shops restaurants bars and touristic attractions specially La Pedrera less than a 5 min walk away The room also has a great bluetooth soundsystem

Negative_Review: Extreme street noise until early hours impossible to sleep in fact we thought the windows were open
Positive_Review: Location brilliant easy access to main attractions

Negative_Review: The quality and quantity of breakfast is quite fair There are not much choices to choose
Positive_Review: I appreciate for your staff service They are willingness to get any information and assist if we need any helps I stayed here for a week The room is modern and tidy For location is quite good not far away for shopping area laramba which is far away about 3 4 intersections by walking

Negative_Review: The walls were thin and you could hear people from other rooms which was not a deal breaker for us but something that was a bit awkward at times
Positive_Review: The location staff room and breakfast were good

Negative_Review: Overall the room seemed clean but we unfortunately discovered a piece of clothing left over from the previous guest in one of the drawers bad
Positive_Review: The room was very nice with good amenities location was also very good and located very close to the centre The staff was very kind and helpful as well

Negative_Review: we were overcharged by the taxi driver from the airport to the hotel and he couldn t even find our hotel we had to walk around looking for it
Positive_Review: reception staff were very helpful room was clean and comfortable overall had a lovely stay pity there were no English speaking channels on t v

Negative_Review: It does not mention on booking that they will take in advance from your debit card the money for the first night It s ok since at the hotel we had the pay only the difference but it has been good to be mentioned
Positive_Review: Everything We had a room on the first floor facing the street and it was not at all noisy also in weekend The bathroom is big for a hotel room and it has an amazing shower There is also a minibar and a seifcase For us the room had all the facilities that we needed

Negative_Review: The air conditioner hadn t worked It started working only on our last day of stay It was very disappointing as it was rather hot in the room
Positive_Review: The personnel at the reception was very friendly There was a tea kettle in the room which was very handy

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Good location in a very nice area of Barcelona had a really nice big clean room and the WiFi was excellent not very common in Spanish hotels otherwise

Negative_Review: The location is good if you plan to see the whole Gaudi but if you orient to spend the most of the time in the old city or near the sea this is not the best choice but still a good one
Positive_Review: a Excellent customer service they are just VERY helpful b Very clean and quite c They serve vegetables for breakfasts together with other tasty things which is a rare case in Spain as I noticed d Close to Diagonal from which you can get anywhere in Barcelona

Negative_Review: Just a minor point tea coffee and milk facilities weren t replaced daily
Positive_Review: The location was perfect the staff very friendly and the room was very clean

Negative_Review: No Negative
